---
title: "Mercedes EQB 350 4MATIC SUV Overall Review"
format: html
---

The Mercedes EQB 350 4MATIC is a stylish, all-electric SUV that offers quick performance, a tech-rich interior, and seating for up to seven. With strong safety features and ample cargo space, it's a practical and premium choice for families. It also comes with a famous and respected name behind it, with the iconic Mercedes star as well.
